items.title: Young leaders advancing potential climate solutions could win $1 million grants
items.description: Youth-led climate groups are getting a $25 million injection from a funding collaborative

items.title: More refunds are being sent to Fortnite players 'tricked' into unwanted purchases. How you can apply
items.description: The Federal Trade Commission is issuing more refunds to Fortnite players who it says were charged for unwanted purchases

items.title: Pentagon leaders double down on the destruction from US attacks on Iran
items.description: The Pentagon’s top leaders have doubled down on how destructive the U.S. attacks had been on Iran's nuclear facilities

items.title: Justices side with Texas death row inmate seeking DNA testing to show he shouldn't be executed
items.description: The Supreme Court has ruled for a Texas death row inmate who's seeking DNA testing to show he should be ineligible for execution
